agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent

  • public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that contains all of the information and functionality and agent requires to play the Prisoner's Dilemma.
    Author:
    Pedro Freire

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Agent(Strategy strat)
      Initialises the agent by attributing it a strategy and setting its utility to zero.

    • Method Summary

      void mapOpponent(Agent opponent, double utility)
      Maps the current opponent to a list of known agents along with the utility gained over the last encounter.
      void printMap(java.util.Map<Agent,java.lang.Integer> map)
      Prints the map of known agents ina human readable format.
      void reset()
      Adds the utility gained over the last game to total utility, sets game utility back to zero, resets the strategy.
      void setAvgUtility()
      Sets the average utility of the agent based on the utility gathered from every known agent.

      • mapOpponent

        public void mapOpponent(Agent opponent,
                        double utility)
        Maps the current opponent to a list of known agents along with the utility gained over the last encounter.
        Parameters:
        opponent - - the opponent of the agent for the current game
        utility - - the utility gained during the encounter with this opponent

      • getStats

        public Statistics getStats()
        Returns:
        the statistics of this agent

      • printMap

        public void printMap(java.util.Map<Agent,java.lang.Integer> map)
        Prints the map of known agents ina human readable format.
        Parameters:
        map - - the map of agents known to this agent

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Adds the utility gained over the last game to total utility, sets game utility back to zero, resets the strategy.
